author: joseiadicicco
title: Platform for Cardano Solar Farms
description: San Juan is one of the poorest areas of Argentina LATAM, with highest sun exposure, lack of water and energy lead to poor living conditions.
solution: Create a Platform allowing investors participate in the project through GREEN token (represents X watts of energy) on Cardano Network
experience: IT specialist, SPO, Telecommunications, Solar Energy, Infrastructure, Engineering and Network Management Systems.
